thread.title: Dark times for workers in the U.S. solar industry

title: Dark times for workers in the U.S. solar industry
text:
Dark times for workers in the U.S. solar industry Wednesday, February 07, 2018 - 01:49 
The U.S. solar industry shed nearly 10,000 jobs in 2017, the first year of job losses in seven years, according to an industry report. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The U.S. solar industry shed nearly 10,000 jobs in 2017, the first year of job losses in seven years, according to an industry report. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2sioU5j
